name: RIP Zombie Car Driving Race
description:
The Zombie Revenge has begun! Zombies everywhere! Drive your car and kill them before they get you! Your skills are your only hope for survival.

The apocalypse has happened but it’s not too late for you! It’s insane and it’s fun! It’s crazy fun!!

Zombies come out of nowhere and their speed increases.

*****Single Touch Controls*****
*****Total new game Play*****
*****8 Locations to Unlock*****
*****Great Time-Killer Game! *****
*****Tons of fun! *****


*****Enjoy!!*****
